snippet: With a rousing program of local and international music acts, Prague Spring kicks off on Saturday, opening with the Czech Philharmonic at the Municipal House in the heart of the city's Old Town.This year's set list is long and impressive, pulling...
abstract: With a rousing program of local and international music acts, Prague Spring kicks off on Saturday, opening with the Czech Philharmonic at the Municipal House in the heart of the city's Old Town.This year's set list is long and impressive, pulling talent from city orchestras across Europe, including Vienna, St. Petersburg, London, Slovakia, Warsaw and, of course, Prague.
